name: clusterws-client-js
description: JavaScript Client for ClusterWS - minimal node js http and real-time framework which allows to scale WebSocket (uWS - one of the fastest WebSocket libraries) between node clusters and utilize all available CPU
author: Dmitrii Goriunov <goriunovd@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run webpack:prod && npm run debug
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd dist/npm && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.webpack:prod: cross-env WEBPACK_ENV=prod webpack && cross-env WEBPACK_ENV=npm webpack
